text: {```json, {"title": "Study - BCIT", "url_source": "https://www.bcit.ca/study/programs/applied-natural-sciences", "published_time": "2020-02-26T23:30:45+00:00", "markdown_content": "BCIT offers over 300 programs and 1000 part-time courses in 6 general areas of study. Search or browse our catalogues to find the right fit for the next step in your career."}, {"title": "Applied and Natural Sciences", "url": "https://www.bcit.ca/study/applied-natural-sciences/programs/", "description": "Design a better tomorrow."}, {"title": "Business and Media", "url": "https://www.bcit.ca/study/business-media/programs/", "description": "Prepare to lead."}, {"title": "Computing & Information Technology", "url": "https://www.bcit.ca/study/computing-it/programs/", "description": "Shape the future of tech."}, {"title": "Engineering", "url": "https://www.bcit.ca/study/engineering/programs/", "description": "Invent creative solutions."}, {"title": "Health Sciences", "url": "https://www.bcit.ca/study/health-sciences/programs/", "description": "Care for those around you."}, {"title": "Trades & Apprenticeships", "url": "https://www.bcit.ca/study/trades-apprenticeships/programs/", "description": "Build a solid foundation."}, {"title": "Full-time studies", "description": "Take a full set of courses that lead towards your career goal. Once accepted, you’re automatically registered into all the courses you need. Choose to enrol in apprenticeship training or co-op education for on-the-job experience while you study."}, {"title": "Flexible Learning", "description": "Select the courses you want to take, in your time. There’s plenty of flexibility, with evening and weekend courses to suit your schedule. Many courses offer a distance & online learning option so you can study from home or at the office."}, {"title": "2024/2025 BCIT Future Student Guide", "url": "https://www.bcit.ca/study/catalogues/", "description": "The 2024/2025 Future Student Guide provides you with the practical information you’re looking for, including how to apply and where you can find out more about our programs and services."}, ```}
